summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5828 for the improvement of 34th Court West, as established by Ordinance No. 76374, in Block 5, Magnolia View Addition, Division No. 2, from Magnolia Boulevard to the southeasterly terminus of said street; and a certain easement; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76800 as amended by Ordinance No. 76857, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
